title: Shopify Products Downloader
description:
The Shopify Product Downloader Chrome extension lets you easily download product data from any Shopify store in CSV or JSON format. Save time by exporting product info with just a few clicks. Import CSVs directly into Shopify for seamless product management.

Key Features: 
✅ Add Shopify Stores via URLs
✅ Download in CSV or JSON (IDs, titles, SKUs, prices, variants)
✅ Direct Import to Shopify
✅ Easy store management
✅ User-friendly interface

Simplify your workflow today!
